data.name: Troll Hunter VR
data.detailed_description:
Troll Hunter is a VR action-adventure about hunting terrifying trolls in '80s Scandinavia using your wit, shotgun, and DIY devices. Explore nordic nature, study trolls, hide and attack to protect civilians.

In this world, trolls are not a myth, they are close and very real, and your goal is to hunt them. You have to locate the troll, learn more about its surroundings and habits, and then lure them into the trap. Of course, in case things go wrong, you can always rely on your trusty weapons.

Please try the Demo!
data.about_the_game:
Troll Hunter is a VR action-adventure about hunting terrifying trolls in '80s Scandinavia using your wit, shotgun, and DIY devices. Explore nordic nature, study trolls, hide and attack to protect civilians.

In this world, trolls are not a myth, they are close and very real, and your goal is to hunt them. You have to locate the troll, learn more about its surroundings and habits, and then lure them into the trap. Of course, in case things go wrong, you can always rely on your trusty weapons.

Please try the Demo!
data.short_description: In Troll Hunter VR action-adventure, you explore harsh nature, study trolls, set traps, and hunt them down to protect civilians. Hunt for ghastly trolls in the alternative '80s Scandinavia, using your wit, trusty shotgun, and DIY devices.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X 10.15.2
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X 10.15.2 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
